title: Can someone honestly explain why Leblanc would need a stealth?
body:
Apparently catching someone with literally 4 free flashes is so easy she needs to also go invisible whenever she gets low hp..... does this actually make sense to anyone?

Edit - The point isnt that the stealth is what makes her op. The point is that someone with that much instant mobility should not have ANOTHER get out of jail free card in a stealth before she dies.

replies.body:
yea, she's a fragile assassin, so they gave her escape mechanics. If she uses her W to escape, she ain't doing damage.
Too bad she has low cd and mana costs on them though. THAT is the problem
she can do damage and still use w to escape...  It's called reactivating the spell.

If she's jumping at you :
1. In lane, learn her range, as stay away
2. In teamfights, she just gave up her positioning
2. Except for the fact she doesn't have a delay (SoonTM) and she can just return the moment she hits her area making it hard to retaliate

> 2. Except for the fact she doesn't have a delay (SoonTM) and she can just return the moment she hits her area making it hard to retaliate

Don't get in range for her to Q-W and her damage is paltry. LeBlanc isn't even that powerful, bad players just don't know how to stay away from her zone of control. Push the lane, make her use her W to clear, and then you can get some nearly free harass off.

If she's playing hyperaggressive and making you miss farm, she's missing farm too. Be patient. As long as you aren't playing a bad champion, you'll be OK as long as you don't feed her.
Personally, I was happy that they buffed her passive (way back when the invis. was added) rather than her damage...

If a champion was persistent and a clone popped out,  you would know exactly which one was the clone.

Not saying that her passive is the best, but stealth is a requirement for the clone to actually work.

Yes, because Shaco also goes invisible when he clones himself. /s

The stealth is unnecessary, you can simply have the clone spawn randomly around her and move her slightly so she is no longer in the exact same spot at the same time. Unless she has a buff/debuff on her, people will have trouble identifying the real and fake one.

W can dash/blink twice R can dash/blink twice. While its not exactly a flash, its still an escape mechanic. 
You stay behind on her mark? She runs
You don't? she goes back.

She can do this 4x
She can choose whether to go back or not twice. Not four times.

Everyone cried about how trash she was before she got that stealth to the point it is at today.

Now people want it nerfed again

*sigh*
Of all of LB's kit, never had an issue with that one. It's her passive, and not a terribly strong one at that.
{{champion:134}} Like I care about your stealth.

Her passive is rather unique.

It can both help and harm her.  I've killed a Le-Blanc with Brand ultimate because of her clone, and cursed as her clone caught an Ashe arrow saving her life.

Le-Blanc needs to be balanced for the pro's and hopefully with meaningful interaction for everyone.  Le-Blanc isn't that OP just SUPER unfun to play against for most of us.

The passive is the most iconic thing about her kit and you want it to be removed? She is the DECEIVER. The problem of leBlanc are the short cd and mana cost on her abilities, and things like her bugged hitbox on E and the instant W recast. Those are the things that make her annoying.
Shaco goes into stealth when he uses his clone...

No.  Shaco literally does not exist on the map when he uses his R.  This is what allows him to dodge anything with it, including DoT damage (Yes.  You can dodge a tick of Ignite with his ult).   It is effectively a .25-.5 second stasis + true invisibility (by that I mean literally nothing in the game can reveal it).

So would you rather riot change it to some form of free damage or something? She has to have something and the passive makes perfect sense on someone called the deceiver. Hell her w and passive are the only deceitful things she has access to and one of them she cant even control.
as much as i dont like leblanc her passive is really cool
The real question is what else would here passive be? Without the stealth it would be useless.
They're not free escapes, they cost mana.
Because late game she's a fragile unhelpful mess. She literally cannot teamfight. It's pick someone off or die.

Meanwhile someone who is equally as squishy plus being melee like our dear Master Yi, has an ever predictable escape mechanism with an easily counterable heal what frankly self stuns him while doing so.

And we look at LB......

Cause LCS BIG PLAYS.
Actually tho, it is quite nice to have LB be able to pull of stupid cool combo's like that. Coming from someone who has never played LB at all, that might just be me being ignorant. I agree she is rather obnoxious, but i think making her more able to be punished if she fucks up her crazy cool plays is a better alternative to toning her cool plays  down all together.
